IDS_AA_PRIORITY_SECTOR_CANT_SET.new: Manual AA defense reinforcement already activated

IDS_CONTEXT_TUTORIAL_AA_SECTOR.new: Press to activate AA defense reinforcement

IDS_DOCK_CONSUME_DESCRIPTION_PCY011_AIRD.old: Increases the intensity of AA fire.
IDS_DOCK_CONSUME_DESCRIPTION_PCY011_AIRD.new:
Expands AA defense area and deals increased damage with shell explosions.

Shell explosions can dazzle enemy aircraft. For best effect, activate the consumable before an enemy squadron begins their attack.

Aircraft can see your ship only while you are spotted by other enemies.

IDS_DOCK_CONSUME_DESCRIPTION_PCY035_CALL.old: Patrol the area and automatically attack enemy aircraft.
IDS_DOCK_CONSUME_DESCRIPTION_PCY035_CALL.new:
Patrol the area and automatically attack enemy aircraft.

These planes cannot spot hostile ships.

IDS_DOCK_CONSUME_DESCRIPTION_PCY035_CALL.old: Patrol the area and automatically attack enemy aircraft in proximity. Detect enemy ships at a distance of no more than 2Â km.
IDS_DOCK_CONSUME_DESCRIPTION_PCY035_CALL.new:
Patrol the area and automatically attack enemy aircraft within a large radius.

These planes cannot spot hostile ships.

IDS_INNATE_SKILL_DESCRIPTION_ADRENALINE_.old:
Your ship's characteristics gradually improve as she loses hit points, down to the minimum HP threshold. As you restore the HP, these modifiers become less effective.

Your ship may begin battle with a reduced amount of HP.
IDS_INNATE_SKILL_DESCRIPTION_ADRENALINE_.new:
Your ship's characteristics gradually improve as she loses hit points, down to the minimum HP threshold. As you restore the HP, these modifiers become less effective.

Your ship begins each battle with a reduced amount of HP.

IDS_PARAMS_MODIFIER_PRIORITYSECTORCOOLDO.new: Manual AA Defense Reinforcement cooldown time

IDS_PARAMS_MODIFIER_PRIORITYSECTORSTARTP.old: Damage caused with a priority sector activated

IDS_PECULARITY_FILTER_BLACK_FRIDAY_SET_S.old: Display standard enemy destruction effects in battle
IDS_PECULARITY_FILTER_BLACK_FRIDAY_SET_S.new: Display Black Friday enemy destruction effect in battle

IDS_PECULARITY_FILTER_BLACK_FRIDAY_TAKE_.old: Hide standard enemy destruction effects in battle
IDS_PECULARITY_FILTER_BLACK_FRIDAY_TAKE_.new: Hide Black Friday enemy destruction effect in battle

IDS_PECULARITY_FILTER_NEW_YEAR_2025_SET_.old: Display thematic enemy destruction effects in battle
IDS_PECULARITY_FILTER_NEW_YEAR_2025_SET_.new: Display the New Year enemy destruction effect in battle

IDS_PECULARITY_FILTER_NEW_YEAR_2025_TAKE.old: Hide thematic enemy destruction effects in battle
IDS_PECULARITY_FILTER_NEW_YEAR_2025_TAKE.new: Hide the New Year enemy destruction effect in battle

IDS_SHIP_DESTRUCTION_DESCR_HIDDEN_BY_PEC.old: Display of standard enemy destruction effect disabled
IDS_SHIP_DESTRUCTION_DESCR_HIDDEN_BY_PEC.new: Display of Black Friday effect disabled

IDS_SHIP_DESTRUCTION_DESCR_HIDDEN_BY_PEC.old: Display of thematic enemy destruction effect disabled
IDS_SHIP_DESTRUCTION_DESCR_HIDDEN_BY_PEC.new: Display of New Year enemy destruction effect disabled

IDS_TIPS_AIRCRAFT_CARRIER_DESCRIPTION.old:
Aircraft carriers do not have main gun batteries. Their role in battle is to deliver air strikes against enemy forces and perform reconnaissance missions.

For the best results, try to keep close to the combat action zone, whilst remaining undetected by the enemy.
Aircraft carriers are vulnerable and should be covered at all times by allies.
IDS_TIPS_AIRCRAFT_CARRIER_DESCRIPTION.new:
The primary role of aircraft carriers is to send aircraft to attack ships and perform reconnaissance missions.

For best results, try to keep close to the combat action zone while remaining undetected by the enemy.
Aircraft carriers are vulnerable and should be covered at all times by allies.

Some aircraft carriers have main battery guns so you can defend yourself manually if the enemy sneaks up on you.

IDS_TIPS_AIR_DEFENSE_SECTOR_GAIN_DESCRIP.old:
Press [CMD_SET_PRIORITY_SECTOR] and select an AA sector to reinforce, depending on the side from which the enemy aircraft are approaching your ship.

This will decrease the efficiency of the other sectors.

Reinforcement will cease automatically.
IDS_TIPS_AIR_DEFENSE_SECTOR_GAIN_DESCRIP.new: Deals instantaneous damage to enemy aircraft. Activates by pressing [CMD_SET_PRIORITY_SECTOR]

IDS_TIPS_BARRAGE_FIRE_DESCRIPTION.old: Increases the intensity of AA fire.
IDS_TIPS_BARRAGE_FIRE_DESCRIPTION.new:
Expands AA defense area and deals increased damage with shell explosions.

Shell explosions can dazzle enemy aircraft. For best effect, activate the consumable before the squadron begins an attack.

Aircraft can see your ship only while you are spotted by other enemies.
